contexts.context: "What tricks can your <mark>troupe</mark> perform?" asked the wizard to the lead acrobat...
...a dismissive gesture toward the Redguard woman in the <mark>troupe</mark>.
...also had some concerns about the outlanders in our <mark>troupe</mark>, though it was our Khajiit tumbler Master S'Rabba...
...no one is faster on their feet than our <mark>troupe</mark>, but Master Neloth's guards were surprisingly quick....
...Neloth's guards were surprisingly quick. I sent the <mark>troupe</mark> through the gate to the docks while I distracted...
...gold and time it takes to train a good <mark>troupe</mark>, and it seemed smarter to try to save...
